entry.title: Free Online Icon Converter
entry.content:
I have found a free online service that can convert an image to icon (.ico). It supports JPEG, GIF, PNG and BMP image format. Before converting image to icon, we can configure the size and color depth. You can try it at this site.

entry.title: QR Code Generator
entry.content:
Hi folks, there's an online tool for generate a QR-code for you. QR Code is a matrix code (or two-dimensional bar code) created by Japanese corporation Denso-Wave in 1994. This tool is easy and free. Just type your URL, text, phone number or SMS and click generate. You can generate the code in varies size (Small, Medium, Large and Xtra Large) . After it's finish generate the code, save your QR-code image to your hard drive.

This is a sample of my QR-code image :

entry.title: GUI Prototyping Tools For Your Application
entry.content: Before you create your real application, it's necessary to prototyping your GUI forms to give an example or illustration to the client. Pencil is a tool that can help you to create it easily. You can grab it here. It runs underlying the Gecko engine, as a firefox plugin. So, you must have firefox first before install it. Pencil can draw the common controls of a form in several design, like GTK+, Windows XP and sketch(like you are drawing it with a real pencil).
